changelog.change: Reworked internals methods related to detecting the game to allow for wider arange of mods to be supported (by GooberRF)
Added support for Soldier of Ultor, NGage SP Promo Campaign, Nano-Theft, LEGO Mod Campaign, Red Doom, AQuest Speedrun Edition, Capture the Flag! and RF Fighter (by GooberRF)
Added support for Barracks Horror (thanks to EckoZero).
Added support for NGage SP Campaign Mod (thanks to EckoZero).
Reworked how the splits are definied, to make it easier to expend autosplitter with mods.
Fixed a bug with game time being incorrectly initialized (it wasn't noticable with a base game and it has not affected no load time in the base game).
Basic support for Red Faction 1.20 (and DashFaction) executable.
Proper handling of null string this time.
Retargeted to .NET used currently by LiveSplit (.NET 4.6.1)
